#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int nTests,nPiles;
    cin >> nTests;
    while(nTests>0)
    {
        cin >> nPiles;
        int Pile,Sum=0;
        for (int i=1;i<=nPiles;i++)
        {
            cin >> Pile;
            Sum += Pile/i;
        }
        if(Sum%2!=0)
        {
            cout << "ALICE" << endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout << "BOB" << endl;
        }
        nTests--;
    }
    return 0;
}
